entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: @MGMF150 Hello, @MGMF150. We understand your concern. However, due to the high volume of case requests since the COVID-19 outbreak, the respective team will be processing the cases substantially longer than usual. >>
@nik_farid_ >>Perubahan nama boleh dibuat dengan menghubungi Pusat Khidmat Pelanggan kami di talian 1300 88 3000 (dalam Malaysia) atau +603 7843 3000 (luar negara) untuk bantuan selanjutnya. -QZ

@nik_farid_ >>Walau bagaimanapun, ejaan nama perlulah betul (termasuk Bin dan Binti). Sekiranya nama pada tiket anda berbeza dengan nama di dokumen perjalanan anda, anda perlulah membuat perubahan pada tiket anda untuk mengelakkan dari sebarang permasalahan pada hari penerbangan.>>

@nik_farid_ Hai, @nik_farid_. Terima kasih kerana menghubungi kami. Untuk makluman, penumpang masih boleh diterima sekiranya urutan nama atau susunan nama tidak sama seperti yang tertera pada dokumen perjalanan (Kad Pengenalan Diri (MyKad/NRIC) atau Passport).>>

data.text:

data.text: @Prajit09581070 Kindly keep your boarding passes as you will need this to complete the Missing Enrich Points Claim. You may visit this link for more details on how to Claim Missing Points and Sectors: [https://t.co/FkaOGsuyUz].

@Prajit09581070 Hi, @Prajit09581070. Thank you for contacting us. We are sorry to hear this. Please be informed that you may claim your missing Enrich points by logging in via the Enrich tab. Once you are logged in, go to "My Miles" and select "Claim Missing Miles".

urls.title: Need Help Recovering Your Baggage? | Malaysia Airlines
urls.description: Learn more about how to file a report and track mishandled baggage through the Self-Service Baggage Reporting portal.

data.text:
@saeedaltaffah << Please refer to the following contact details:

Contact Number: +603 8777 2288
Email Address: MHLbags@malaysiaairlines.com.my
Operating Hours: Mishandled Luggage Office (MLO) (7.00 AM to11.59 PM)

Kindly visit this link for more details: https://t.co/dBKox3urXL.

Regards,
MP

urls.title: Mishandled Baggage Forms
urls.description: Find deals and book great value fares to 60+ destinations worldwide. Malaysia Airlines is the national carrier of Malaysia, offering the best way to fly to, from and around Malaysia.

data.text: @saeedaltaffah << A Property Irregularity Report (PIR) number will be provided. If you don't have a PIR number yet, kindly fill in the online form found on this link: https://t.co/V23Cel58un. Alternatively, you may contact our Mishandled Baggage department for further and immediate assistance.

@saeedaltaffah Hello, @saeedaltaffah. We are sorry to hear this. Please be advised that any concerns regarding baggage, including lost luggage must be reported immediately upon arrival at the Mishandled Luggage Office, before leaving the airport. >>

@akil_y We are sorry to hear this, @akil_y. Kindly share with us the following details via Direct Message for our further checks:

Passenger's name:
E-ticket number:
Booking reference number:
Email address: 

We look forward to hearing from you soon. -NB

@ramu_katha >> since your booking was finalised via a travel agency, once there is an update, the respective travel agent will get in touch with you accordingly. Please contact your travel agent for further clarification. -JJ
2/2

@ramu_katha We are sorry that you feel this way, @ramu_katha. However, please be informed that we requested for your travel agent's details so that our department concerned could contact your travel agent for your request. Therefore, >>
1/2
@ramu_katha Hi, @ramu_katha. As we mention below, our sales department has contacted your travel agent for resubmitting. We would recommend you contact your travel agent for further updates. -YU

@ramu_katha Hello, @ramu_katha. As mentioned in the previous message, since a travel agency finalised your booking, we are unable to advise you differently than the resolution given earlier. Therefore, kindly get in touch with your respective agency for further assistance. -LE

@ramu_katha Hello, @ramu_katha. As mentioned in the previous message, since a travel agency finalised your booking, we are unable to advise you differently than the resolution given earlier. Therefore, kindly get in touch with your respective agency for further assistance. -LE
